mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DAVI_CERTIFICATED_BOARD VALUES(#{memberId}, CERTIFICATED_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{certificatedTitle}, #{certificatedContent}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT CERTIFICATEDNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM DAVI_CERTIFICATED_BOARD ORDER BY CERTIFICATEDNUM DESC) WHERE MEMBERID = #{memberId} AND ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, D.* FROM (SELECT * FROM DAVI_CERTIFICATED_BOARD ORDER BY CERTIFICATEDNUM DESC) D) F WHERE F.R BETWEEN #{startRow} and #{endRow}
mapper.delete: DELETE DAVI_CERTIFICATED_LIKE WHERE CERTIFICATEDNUM = #{certificatedNum} AND MEMBERID = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DAVI_CERTIFICATED_LIKE WHERE CERTIFICATEDNUM = #{certificatedNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DAVI_CERTIFICATED_LIKE WHERE CERTIFICATEDNUM = #{certificatedNum} AND MEMBERID = #{memberId}
SELECT D.* FROM (SELECT COUNT(CERTIFICATEDNUM) LIKECNT, CERTIFICATEDNUM FROM DAVI_CERTIFICATED_LIKE GROUP BY CERTIFICATEDNUM ORDER BY LIKECNT DESC) D WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 12
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DAVI_CERTIFICATED_REPLY VALUES(#{certificatedNum}, CERTIFICATED_REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{certificatedReplyContent}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM DAVI_CERTIFICATED_REPLY WHERE CERTIFICATEDNUM = #{certificatedNum} ORDER BY CERTIFICATEDREPLYNUM DESC
SELECT TO_CHAR(CERTIFICATEDDATE,'MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') FROM DAVI_CERTIFICATED_BOARD WHERE CERTIFICATEDNUM = #{certificatedNum}
